entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
